Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, 48th pl & into the terminal, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, 48th Place & into the terminal, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Washington. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Washington.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
